name: latex2mathml
summary: Pure Python library for LaTeX to MathML conversion

chunks.text:
latex2mathml

Pure Python library for LaTeX to MathML conversion

Installation

Usage

Command-line

References

LaTeX

MathML

- http://www.xmlmind.com/tutorials/MathML/

usage_description:
Here is a 2-sentence summary of what a developer can achieve with this library:

This library is used to convert LaTeX equations and formulas into MathML, enabling developers to integrate mathematical expressions into web applications and documents in a standardized and platform-independent way. With latex2mathml, developers can easily render LaTeX-based math content in web browsers, making it accessible for visually impaired users or those who prefer interactive math experiences.
